testcase.name: Add customer
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome browser............................................passed When User opens URL "http://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"...............passed And User enters Email as "admin@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin"......passed And Click on Login..........................................................passed Then User can view Dashboard................................................passed When User click on Customers Menu...........................................passed And Click on customer Menu Item.............................................passed And Click on Add new Button.................................................passed Then User can view Add new customer page....................................passed When User enter customer info...............................................passed And Click on Save button....................................................passed Then User can view confirmation message "The new customer has been added successfully.".passed And close browser...........................................................passed

testcase.name: Successful Login with Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome browser............................................passed When User opens URL "http://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"...............passed And User enters Email as "admin@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin"......passed And Click on Login..........................................................passed Then Page Title should be "Dashboard / nopCommerce administration"..........passed When User click on Log out link.............................................passed Then Page Title should be "Your store. Login"...............................passed And close browser...........................................................passed
